data.comment: The match has started at Estadio TSM Corona.
Free kick Santos Laguna.
In the minute 2, Can Santos Laguna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Pachuca.
In Torreon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Santos Laguna.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna at Estadio TSM Corona.
Santos Laguna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 7, Throw-in Pachuca.
Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Santos Laguna.
Throw-in for Pachuca close to the penalty box.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Santos Laguna in their own half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a Santos Laguna throw-in in Pachuca's half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 14, Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Torreon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Santos Laguna push forward at Estadio TSM Corona and Hugo Rodriguez gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Pachuca defence.
In the minute 18, Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
Pachuca to take a throw-in in Santos Laguna territory.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Santos Laguna in their own half.
Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Throw-in high up the field for Santos Laguna in Torreon.
In the minute 21, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
Ball safe as Santos Laguna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Santos Laguna.
In the minute 24, Goal kick for Santos Laguna at Estadio TSM Corona.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Pachuca a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Torreon.
In the minute 29, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Santos Laguna.
Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 31, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Santos Laguna.
Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
In the minute 33, Santos Laguna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pachuca have a goal kick.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Pachuca.
In the minute 35, Santos Laguna's Fernando Gorriaran has been booked in Torreon.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick Santos Laguna.
In the minute 37, Luis Chavez (Pachuca) has received a first yellow card.
In Torreon, Doria of Santos Laguna is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
In the minute 41, Cristian Souza is replacing Romario Ibarra for the away team.
Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 43, Santos Laguna to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in the half of Pachuca.
In Torreon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Santos Laguna in their own half.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in the half of Pachuca.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a Santos Laguna throw-in in Pachuca's half.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in the half of Pachuca.
In the minute 45, Santos Laguna have been given a penalty at Estadio TSM Corona...
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Luis Chavez puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Goal! The home team is awarded a penalty in Torreon. Julio Furch converts to level the scoring at 1-1.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Torreon.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Torreon.
Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Pachuca.
Throw-in for Pachuca at Estadio TSM Corona.
Goal kick for Pachuca at Estadio TSM Corona.
In the minute 50, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Torreon to check on Victor Guzman, who is grimacing with pain.
At Estadio TSM Corona, Victor Guzman has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 56, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a throw-in for Santos Laguna, close to Pachuca's area.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Pachuca a goal kick.
Can Santos Laguna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
In the minute 57, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
In Torreon Santos Laguna drive forward through Julio Furch. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
In the minute 61, Santos Laguna have a goal kick.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
Throw-in Pachuca.
In the minute 64, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Victor Guzman is back on the pitch.
In the minute 65, Ball goes out of play for a Santos Laguna goal kick.
Pachuca make their second substitution with Victor Davila replacing Victor Sosa.
Paulo Pezzolano (Pachuca) is making a third substitution, with Roberto Nurse replacing Roberto de la Rosa.
In the minute 68, Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Santos Laguna to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna at Estadio TSM Corona.
In the minute 71, In Torreon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Adrian Lozano is on a sub for Bryan Garnica for Santos Laguna.
The home team have replaced Walter Sandoval with Carlos Orrantia. This is the second substitution made today by Jorge Guillermo Almada.
In the minute 75, Pachuca drive forward but Victor Davila is judged offside.
Throw-in for Pachuca in their own half.
Pachuca are pushing forward but Luis Chavez's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 77, It's a goal kick for the home team in Torreon.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a Pachuca throw-in in Santos Laguna's half.
In the minute 78, Pachuca are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in the half of Pachuca.
The home team replace Octavio Rivero with Jesus Ocejo.
In the minute 80, Can Pachuca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos Laguna's half?
Pachuca's Victor Davila is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Santos Laguna.
In the minute 83, Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
Goal kick for Pachuca at Estadio TSM Corona.
Pachuca to take a throw-in in Santos Laguna territory.
In the minute 85, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Santos Laguna.
Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
Efrain Orona is replacing Luis Chavez for the away team.
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Pachuca a goal kick.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Pachuca's Erick Aguirre looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in their own half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a Santos Laguna throw-in in Pachuca's half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
The match at Estadio TSM Corona has been interrupted briefly for a check on Erick Aguirre, who is down injured.
